title: Reissue Lost Policy Documents
description: A life insurance policyholder has lost their physical policy contract and requests a duplicate copy.

tasks.expected_outcome: Agent securely verifies the customer's identity.

tasks.description: Generate a duplicate copy of the original policy contract.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully generates the duplicate document.

tasks.description: Mail the duplicate policy to the customer's address on file.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent processes the mailing of the physical document.
